A: He says he was scrolling Instagram and saw an ad of Timbaland making a beat in the studio, and the video briefly shows him outside using his smartphone during this segment.

The host mentions that he was scrolling through Instagram when he came across an ad for Timbaland's Masterclass. This ad showed him making a beat in the studio, which piqued his interest. The video then cuts to an outdoor shot of him using his smartphone, likely while watching the ad on his phone. This combination of on-screen imagery and narration explains why the host decided to buy Timbaland's Masterclass and use a technique from it in this video.

The host transitions from a mouth-made outline to his workstation because he needs to edit and enhance the audio further. He plans to use Logic Pro X to add ear candy and chords to spice up the outline (option A).
